actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that Richard M. Nixon be granted immunity from prosecution for certain alleged offenses against the United States.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that Richard M. Nixon be granted immunity from prosecution for certain alleged offenses against the United States.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that Richard M. Nixon be granted immunity from prosecution for certain alleged offenses against the United States.
